description: One signature, custom-printed Notesmith wired notebook in A5 (8.5 x 5.5 inches) with 140 pages, 70lb paper, and extra thick cover stock that is laminated on both sides.
longDescription: All of our Wired Notebooks are produced and manufactured in our factory in New York. They are made only with materials sourced from American vendors and are made-to-order according to your custom specifications.
name: Pro Wired Notebook A5 (Custom)
infoList: Designed and manufactured in U.S.A. only
High quality, bright white and ultra smooth writing paper
Covers with extra thick cover stock and double-sided lamination

halfandhalf.heading: Fountain pen friendly
halfandhalf.text: Our carefully selected writing paper is fountain pen friendly. Bright white and ultra smooth, our paper is a pleasure to write on. We use a 70lb paper weight, which is not too thick or thin - perfect for writing!

halfandhalf.heading: A layout for everyone
halfandhalf.text: Choose from any of our premade templates to create a custom notebook that fits your needs. Or, utilize our online page editor to create your very own custom layout!

hero.heading: Carefully selected, expertly crafted
hero.text: With our notebooks, you can expect a high quality product that was crafted with a focus on delivering an excellent writing experience. If you're not satisfied with your purchase, we offer free returns within 14 days of purchase.

infoBoxes.heading: Materials
infoBoxes.text: 70lb text paper, double-mounted 130lb coated cover stock, gold wire, sand-matte textured lamination

infoBoxes.heading: Size
infoBoxes.text: 5.5 x 8.5 inches (page size), 6 x 8.5 inches (book size)

infoBoxes.heading: Returns
infoBoxes.text: Free returns within 14 days of purchase
